languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.
languages.original_text: Корабль летит по прямой и совершает U-образный разворот в конце движения. Восстановление: случайное, 1–3 раунда. ! Можно использовать только во время фазы Ускорения

traits.locale_text: The Flagship flies in a straight line, making a U-turn at the end of its movement. Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the acceleration phase.
The Flagship flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement. Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the acceleration phase.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

languages.text: Корабль летит по прямой и совершает U-образный разворот в конце движения. Восстановление: случайное, (от 1 до 3) раундов. ! Можно использовать только во время {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}фазы ускорения{/g}

Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} fliegt in einer geraden Linie und führt am Ende seiner Bewegung eine vollständige Wende aus. Abklingzeit: (von 1 bis 3) Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip. ! Kann nur während der {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}Beschleunigungsphase{/g} eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} fliegt in einer geraden Linie und führt am Ende seiner Bewegung eine vollständige Wende aus. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}: 1-3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} nach dem Zufallsprinzip. ! Kann nur während der {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}Beschleunigungsphase{/g} eingesetzt werden.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} vole en ligne droite et effectue un demi-tour à la fin de son déplacement. Temps de recharge : (de 1 à 3) rounds (aléatoire). ! Utilisable uniquement lors de la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}phase d'accélération{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau{/g} vole en ligne droite et effectue un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}virage{/g} en U à la fin de son déplacement. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Délai de récupération{/g} : 1 à 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (aléatoire). ! Utilisable uniquement lors de la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}phase d'accélération{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}沿直线飞行，移动结束时，进行一次完整的U型转向。 冷却时间：随机一到三轮。 ！此能力只能在{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速阶段{/g}使用。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}沿直线飞行，移动结束时，进行一次完整的U型转向。 冷却时间：随机一到三轮。 ！此能力只能在{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速阶段{/g}使用。

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} vuela en línea recta, ejecutando un giro de 180 grados completo al terminar su movimiento. Tiempo de recuperación: (de 1 a 3) asaltos aleatoriamente. ! Solo se puede usar durante la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}fase de aceleración{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が一直線に飛行し、移動後にUターンする。 クールダウン：ランダムで(1～3)ラウンド。 ！{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速フェーズ{/g}でのみ使用可能。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} flies in a straight line, making a full U-turn at the end of its movement. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が直線上に進み、移動の終点でU{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}：1-3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}（ランダム） ！{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速フェーズ{/g}中にのみ使用可能。
